verses.verse: When the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and hath cast out <S%H5394><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than thou;

And when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> thee; thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> them, and utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy <S%H2763><s%> them; thou shalt make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, nor shew mercy <S%H2603><s%> unto them:

Neither shalt thou make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them; thy daughter <S%H1323><s%> thou shalt not give <S%H5414><s%> unto his son <S%H1121><s%>, nor his daughter <S%H1323><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> unto thy son <S%H1121><s%>.

For they will turn away <S%H5493><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> me, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>: so will the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and destroy <S%H8045><s%> thee suddenly <S%H4118><s%>.

But thus shall ye deal <S%H6213><s%> with them; ye shall destroy <S%H5422><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>, and break down <S%H7665><s%> their images <S%H4676><s%>, and cut down <S%H1438><s%> their groves <S%H842><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> their graven images <S%H6456><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>. their images: Heb. their statues, or, pillars

For thou art an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> thee to be a special <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself, above all people <S%H5971><s%> that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> did not set his love <S%H2836><s%> upon you, nor choose <S%H977><s%> you, because ye were more <S%H7230><s%> in number than any people <S%H5971><s%>; for ye were the fewest <S%H4592><s%> of all people <S%H5971><s%>:

But because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> loved <S%H160><s%> you, and because he would keep <S%H8104><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which he had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondmen <S%H5650><s%>, from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, he is God <S%H430><s%>, the faithful <S%H539><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, which keepeth <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with them that love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>;

And repayeth <S%H7999><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him to their face <S%H6440><s%>, to destroy <S%H6><s%> them: he will not be slack <S%H309><s%> to him that hateth <S%H8130><s%> him, he will repay <S%H7999><s%> him to his face <S%H6440><s%>.

Thou shalt therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> them.

Wherefore it shall come to pass, if <S%H6118><s%> ye hearken <S%H8085><s%> to these judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> unto thee the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and the mercy <S%H2617><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>: if: Heb. because

And he will love <S%H157><s%> thee, and bless <S%H1288><s%> thee, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee: he will also bless <S%H1288><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy womb <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%>, thy corn <S%H1715><s%>, and thy wine <S%H8492><s%>, and thine oil <S%H3323><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine <S%H504><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee.
Thou shalt be blessed <S%H1288><s%> above all people <S%H5971><s%>: there shall not be male <S%H6135><s%> or female barren <S%H6135><s%> among you, or among your cattle <S%H929><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will take away <S%H5493><s%> from thee all sickness <S%H2483><s%>, and will put <S%H7760><s%> none of the evil <S%H7451><s%> diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>, upon thee; but will lay <S%H5414><s%> them upon all them that hate <S%H8130><s%> thee.

And thou shalt consume <S%H398><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee; thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall have no pity <S%H2347><s%> upon them: neither shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>; for that will be a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto thee.
If thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, These nations <S%H1471><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> than I; how <S%H349><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> I dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them?

Thou shalt not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them: but shalt well <S%H2142><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> what the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and unto all Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;

The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, and the signs <S%H226><s%>, and the wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and the stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, whereby the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought thee out <S%H3318><s%>: so shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%> of whom thou art afraid <S%H3373><s%> <S%H6440><s%>.

Moreover the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> among them, until they that are left <S%H7604><s%>, and hide <S%H5641><s%> themselves from <S%H6440><s%> thee, be destroyed <S%H6><s%>.

Thou shalt not be affrighted <S%H6206><s%> at <S%H6440><s%> them: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, a mighty <S%H1419><s%> God <S%H410><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will put out <S%H5394><s%> those <S%H411><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee by little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%>: thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not consume <S%H3615><s%> them at once <S%H4118><s%>, lest the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> increase <S%H7235><s%> upon thee. put: Heb. pluck off

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them unto thee <S%H6440><s%>, and shall destroy <S%H1949><s%> them with a mighty <S%H1419><s%> destruction <S%H4103><s%>, until they be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>. unto: Heb. before thy face

And he shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and thou shalt destroy <S%H6><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>: there shall no man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, until thou have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them.

The graven images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%> shall ye burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: thou shalt not desire <S%H2530><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%> that is on them, nor take <S%H3947><s%> it unto thee, lest thou be snared <S%H3369><s%> therein: for it is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.

Neither shalt thou bring <S%H935><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> into thine house <S%H1004><s%>, lest thou be a cursed thing <S%H2764><s%> like it: but thou shalt utterly <S%H8262><s%> detest <S%H8262><s%> it, and thou shalt utterly <S%H8581><s%> abhor <S%H8581><s%> it; for it is a cursed thing <S%H2764><s%>.
